title: Is George Floyd more influential than Gandhi? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. If You Look At Most Contemporary Indian Leaders Like Nehru, Mahatma Gandhi, NSC Bose, Karunanidhi Or Even Atal Bihari Vajpayee None Could Solve Local Issues. They Only Concentrated On Foreigners And Painted An Impression That Foreigners Was Culprit. Even Back In History Rulers Like Prithviraj Chauhan, Aurangazeb, Shivaji Always Used To Use Religion As Tool To Spread Their Kingdom Instead Of What's Otherwise Stated. A Commoner Like George Flyod Had To Lose His Life For No Gains Just Because He Was Coloured. He Was Going Through Motions When Race Issues Forced His Life To Be Cut Short.
